rukus.text: 15|80|Hijuru no nakama mo shito-tachi o usotsuki to shite kyohi shita.
15|81|Ware wa kare-ra ni waga shuju no shirushi o kudashitaga, kare-ra wa sorera o sake (te mushi shi)ta.
15|82|Kare-ra wa (iwa) yama ni ie o horikomi, anzendearu to kangaete ita.
15|83|Soredearu Chō, hitokoe (chōbatsu) ga, kare-ra o osotte,
15|84|kare-ra ga (tokubetsu no chishiki to gijutsu de) kizuki itonande ita koto wa, kare-ra ni totte nani mo yakudatanakatta.

15|85|Ware wa ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o, tada shinri ni motodzuite sōzō shita. (Shinpan no)-ji wa hontōni kite iru noda. Dakara anata wa nasakebukaku kan'yō ni (hitobito no kashitsu ya ketten o) yurushite yaru ga ī.
15|86|Hontōni anata no omo wa, ban'yū o sōzō shita zenchi no okata de ara reru.
15|87|Ware wa taezu kurikaesa rerubeki 7tsu (no setsu) to, idaina kuruān o anata ni sazuketa.

15|88|Ano mono-tachi no nan'ninka ni ware ga sazuketa tanoshimi ni taishite urayamashi-sō ni shite wa naranai. Soshite sore ni kokoro o itamete wa naranai. Sore yori anata no tsubasa o hikuku (shite yasashiku) shi nasai.
15|89|Soshite itte yaru ga ī. `Hontōni watashi wa kōmeina keikoku-shadearu.'
15|90|(Keiji o katte ni) bunkatsu shita mono ni taishite mo, ware wa keiji shite oita.
15|91|Sunawachi kuruān o (kare-ra no tsugō no yoi yō ni) danpen ni shita-sha-tachi ni mo.
15|92|Sore de, anata no omo ni chikaite, ware wa kanarazu kare-ra subete o jinmon surudearou.
15|93|Kare-ra ga okonatta subete no koto ni tsui te.
15|94|Dakara anata ga meiji rareta koto o sen'yō shi nasai. Soshite tashinkyō to kara tōzakare.
15|95|Hontōni ware wa, chōshō suru mono ni taishi, anata o jūbun ni mamotte yaru.
15|96|Kare-ra wa, arrā ni soto no kami o haisuruga, mamonaku shirudearou.
15|97|Ware wa kare-ra no kuchi ni suru koto de, anata no mune ga shimetsuke rareru no o shitte iru.
15|98|Dakara, anata no omo o tataete 唱念 Shi, sajida shite,
15|99|sadame no toki ga otozureru made, anata no omo ni tsukae nasai.
